name: Jogo do Cascão
description:
This time Smudge is in trouble! It started to rain and he is a long way from home.

How are we going to make sure he doesn't lose his famous dirty reputation? The path is full of obstacles.

You can control Smudge through several stages jumping, sweeping and doing everything to dodge obstacles. The rain is coming and any mistake could mean the unimaginable!

Smudge will go through stages in the countryside, city and amusement park, each with different characteristics and missions. Collect coins and use the "power-ups" to get through the most difficult levels!

  • Umbrella makes Smudge soar!

  • Skate, buck and other cool power-ups are available!

  • The best score of each stage will win among your friends.

  • Your friends' progress is on the level map.

  • Special obstacles like the zip line and the pouf.

  • Procedurally generated levels.

  • You can send and receive gifts with lives and power-ups from friends.

  • Game fully focused on player skill!

The Smudge Game is free, but there are items that require payment such as recovering lives and others. You can go to your device's settings if you want to disable in-app purchases.
